name: VK Квадратные аватары (Anti Border-radius)
description:
No round avatar in VK

Исправлен круглый аватар в новых опросах.
Нашел круглый аватар, сделаем квадратным, просто скажи где нашел.
css:
@-moz-document domain(vk.com) 
{
/*
Author - KiLleR
https://vk.com/killer_nsk
*/
/*** Убираем скругления элементов ***/
.ts_cont_wrap 
  {
  left: 170px !important;
  }
.event:after 
  {
  margin: 0 -15px -15px 0;
  }
.module_body .people_cell_img 
  {
  border-radius: 0;
  }
.fans_fan_img 
  {
  border-radius: 4px;
  }
.apps_feed_user_photo img,
.Avatar__img,
.Avatar__wrapper,
.bookmark_page_item,
.bookmark_page_item__image,
.bp_img,
.chat_tab_close,
.chat_tab_img,
.fans_idolph_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.fans_idolph_wrap,
.feed_friend_image,
.feed_friend_photo_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.feedback_img,
.feedback_row_answer .feedback_img,
.flist_item_thumb
.friends_phonebook .friends_photo_img,
.friends_photo_img,
.friends_photo_wrap .ui_zoom_inner,
.group_row_img,
.group_row_photo,
.im-chat-input .im-chat-input--txt-wrap,
.im-chat-placeholder .im-chat-placeholder--img,
.im-chat-placeholder.im-creation--avatar._im_create_avatar,
.im-popular--avatar,
.im-prebody img,
.like_share_ava.wdd_imgs,
.like_tt_image, 
.mail_box_single_ava .mail_box_single_ava_img,
.mention_tt_img,
.mention_tt_person_img,
.module_body .people_cell_img,
.mv_author_img,
.im_grid>img,
.nim-peer--photo-w,
.nim-peer--photo>img,
.notifier_image, 
.olist_item_photo,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_comm,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_mid,
.ow_ava.ow_ava_small,
.owner_photo_preview50,
.owner_photo_preview100,
.page_group_image,
.page_list_module .thumb,
.page_list_module img.cell_img,
.poll_tt_image,
.post_img, .post_field_user_image,
.profile_career_img,
.right_list_img,
.search_item_img,
.search_row.ui_zoom_inner,
.submit_post_box .thumb_off,
.submit_post_box .thumb_on,
.tag_frame_inner,
.top_notify_cont .feedback_img,
.top_profile_img, 
.ts_contact_img,
.ui_ownblock_img,
.ui_zoom_inner,
.voting_tt_image,
.wall_module .copy_post_img,
.wall_module .reply_img,
.wddi_img,
a.fc_msgs_img,
img.settings_bl_photo,
img.wdd_img,
img.fc_contact_photo,
input#ts_input.text.ts_input
  {
border-radius: 1px !important;
  }
}
